opinion.posture: Indictments charging defendant with assault and rape. Before DURHAM, J. Verdict of guilty and judgment of sentence entered. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 2000, Oct. T., 1977, from Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, Sept. T., 1975, Nos. 2084 and 2088. Argued December 7, 1977.
opinion.attorneys: B. Williams, with him Nino V. Tinari, forPage 609 appellant; William C. Turnoff, Assistant District Attorney, with him F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
